description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(570).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,382,0,0,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (1 + x - x^2)*(1 + 8*x^2 + x^4)/(1 - 382*x^4 + x^8). - _Colin Barker_, Dec 01 2013a(n) = 382*a(n-4) - a(n-8) for n>7. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 14 2014
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,1,7,8,375,383,2673,3056]; [n le 8 select I[n] else 382*Self(n-4)-Self(n-8): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 14 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
